parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From epi and echo; to hold upon, i.e. to retain; to detain; to pay attention to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 2nd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I remain, tarry, (b) I remain in, persist in. From epi and meno; to stay over, i.e. Remain.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 2nd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
